page.title: 20SUMMARY PAGE-CLASS 7
page.content: The children have found the project both interesting and challenging.Our block had a wide range-from{arable farming to new{private estates(which serve our school)to the older and poorer{council estates.}In the area the importance of{Sleaford Road}as a } {boundary line}emerged.Our thanks are given to the{Technical Servic Dept. of {Boston Borough}for help with the maps, {Mrs.Paterson}for the interview,{Mr&Mrs {Ashton for the visit to Willoughby Farm.Finally to the children for their patience with me,especially{Julian {Oliver}for his expertise with the computer.
